title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-13] [$250] Tags - When deleting all tags, blank UI is shown
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Open the New Expensify App
2. Sign into a valid account
3. Click on WS > More features > Enable Tags (Notice that there will be an UI there since you have no tags yet)
4. Create any tag then delete this tag

Expected result: User expects the initial "No Tag" UI to show up again and immediately

Actual result: None
